items.values: Ergonomic design provides comfortable support for your wrist while typing or gaming
Reduces strain and fatigue on your wrist, allowing for longer periods of use
Non-slip base keeps the pad securely in place on your desk or table
Made with high-quality materials for durability and long-lasting use
Perfect for anyone who spends long hours working or gaming on their computer or laptop

content_list: The first return for EVERY order is free! To avoid additional shipping costs and minimize the environmental impact of multiple returns, we suggest that you select the items you wish to return together.
All eligible items can be returned in their original condition within 90 days of purchase for a full refund.

Items purchased from Temu are eligible for our price adjustment policy. Temu will provide the price difference in the currency that the order was paid in if the list price of the item purchased was reduced within 30 days of purchase in the same country or region. The shipment of your order will not be affected by applying for a price adjustment before you receive your item(s). You can request a price adjustment refund by selecting the relevant order in 'Your Orders' and clicking on the 'Price adjustment' button.

Items that are on clearance, promotions or no longer available, etc. may not be eligible for our price adjustment policy. Fees, including but not limited to shipping fees, will be excluded for any price adjustment calculation. Temu reserves the right to the final interpretation of our price adjustment policy, the right to modify the terms of this policy at any time, and the right to deny any price adjustment at our sole discretion.

mall_review.entrance_tips: This provider is rated 4.6 stars and has 8,558 reviews for other items.

rating_guidelines_popup_vo.content:
Customer reviews, including star ratings, help customers to learn more about the item to decide whether it is the right item for them.
Temu calculates a star rating using machine-learned models instead of a simple average. They use multiple criteria that establish the authenticity and trustworthiness of the review. The system continues to learn and improve over time.
rating_guidelines_popup_vo.title: Guidelines for rating

review_authenticity_popup_vo.title: This means that all reviewers posted their reviews after purchasing the item(s) from Temu.

review_info_list.comment: Good size and good quality. Very nice mousepad. Nice color. Overall better than I expected. Great price.
review_info_list.name: Shilpa

review_info_list.comment: Es muy cómoda, aún no le doy su función como debería, pero seguro es excelente!, solo que mi cajonera no pudo cerrar debido a que es un poco gruesa la almohadilla, pero aparte de eso, es eficiente y muy cómoda!. Espero me deje de doler mi muñeca con esta almohadilla. Me gustó Mucho.
review_info_list.name: jb***07

review_lang.translate_comment: It is very comfortable, I still do not give it its function as it should, but it sure is excellent!, only that my chest of drawers could not close because the pad is a bit thick, but apart from that, it is efficient and very comfortable!. I hope my wrist stops hurting with this pad. I liked it a lot.

review_info_list.comment: llegaron bien, están en excelente y muy de acuerdo con el precio, ya descansa un poquito mi muñeca x que trabajo mucho en la computadora. muchas gracias las recomiendo

review_lang.translate_comment: They arrived well, they are in excellent and very much in accordance with the price, my X doll rests a little bit because I work a lot on the computer. Thank you very much, I recommend you
